Class Saab95

java.lang.Object
Saab95
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loadable, LoadableCar, Moveable
public class Saab95 extends Object implements LoadableCar
Object class for constructing a Saab95 with its specific features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Saab95()
    Constructs a 125 horse-power, two-door, red SAAB95 with start position in (0, 0).

    • gas

      public void gas(double amount)
      Speeds up the car.
      Parameters:
      amount - Factor increasing the speed, must be in the interval [0,1].
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when amount is outside the interval [0,1].
